Highlights.text: Chris Gayle has won the most number of man of the match awards throughout IPL (17). His batting strike rate is a staggering 152.4
Virat Kohli holds the record for most runs scored by a batsman in IPL history (4115)
M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bangalore has hosted the most number of IPL matches (58)
Lasith Malinga has take the most of wickets in IPL history (159)
Suresh Raina holds the records for most number of catches in IPL history (79)
